#include<iostream>
#include<algorithm>
#include<iomanip>
#include<string.h>
#include<math.h>
#include<stdio.h>
#include<stdlib.h>
#include<limits.h>
using namespace std;
int main(){
long long int T,N,i,j,x,ans;
scanf("%lld",&T);
while(T--){
    scanf("%lld",&N);
    
    x = 1;
    while(x<=N){
        x*=2;
            }
    x/=2;
   
    ans = x+x-1;
   
    printf("%lld\n",ans);
}
return 0;
}
